decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity to quickly bring out powerful creatures from the deck, such as Archon of Cruelty. Wrenn and Six, Leyline Binding, and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker are key pieces in setting up the combo. Teferi, Time Raveler helps protect the combo and disrupt opponents, while cards like Bitter Reunion and Persist provide additional utility. The deck also includes versatile spells like Prismari Command and Lightning Bolt for removal and control. The mana base includes various fetch lands and Triomes to ensure consistency in mana production.

The deck focuses on utilizing the powerful Eldrazi creatures and artifacts to aggressively disrupt opponents and control the board. With cards like Chalice of the Void, Karn, the Great Creator, and Thought-Knot Seer, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while deploying its own threats. The deck also utilizes the Tron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Tower) to quickly ramp into its high-cost threats like Reality Smasher and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. With a mix of disruption, ramp, and powerful threats, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo between Indomitable Creativity and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate powerful board states. It aims to create a large number of artifact tokens with the ability to deal damage, disrupt the opponent's strategy, and control the board. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending, as well as counterspells like Spell Pierce. It utilizes the planeswalkers Teferi, Time Raveler and Wrenn and Six to provide additional control and value. The mana base consists of fetch lands and shock lands to ensure consistent mana sources.
